name: Entitatis Mundus
description:
In this simple yet challenging level-based platformer game, you will get to enjoy a new world ruled by The Entity. Can you survive while it manipulates the reality around you?  On top of this, you will have a chance to get involved in a scary story about the process of creating and training your replacement.

Controls

  • Use A and D for moving (alternatively left and right arrows)
  • Use W for jumping (alternatively up arrow)
  • Hold the Delete key on startup to clear all progress (after refreshing the page or reopening the installed game)

This game only works on computer devices at the moment.

Made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 by a single developer.

Credits

  • Pixel art - made using MediBang Paint Pro
  • Sound effects - from Zapsplat edited using Audacity
  • Music - made using MuseScore 3
  • Made with Unity
